you rerun the cronjob & it's supposed to remove it, or that's my understanding
there's a cron job for prelink!? And I was manually doing prelink -a all this time.

there's not only a cronjob in cron.daily, but if you add "DPkg::Post-Invoke {"echo Running prelink, please wait...;/etc/cron.daily/prelink";}"  to /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/30prelink , then apt will rerun prelink anytime you add new pkgs
